alert.note: Alert for Ashe; Watauga (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 2:45PM EST until January 16 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM MONDAY TO 7 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 7 inches. The heaviest snowfall amounts will be in Tazewell and Smyth Counties. * WHERE...In North Carolina, Ashe and Watauga Counties. In Virginia, Tazewell, Smyth and Grayson Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM Monday to 7 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will be in the lower 20s to lower 30s on Monday with wind chill values in the teens. Lows Monday night will be in the lower teens to lower 20s.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
